CustomField.description: Required in SpringCM; used to indicate whether there Lapse Criteria is required. If so, users will be required to populate the Lapse Criteria, Lapse Criteria Detail, and Consecutive Inactive Months to Lapsed fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required in SpringCM; used to indicate whether there Lapse Criteria is required. If so, users will be required to populate the Lapse Criteria, Lapse Criteria Detail, and Consecutive Inactive Months to Lapsed fields.
CustomField.label: Is there Lapse Criteria?
